title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 2:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Tuesday Feb 17, 2026 @ 2:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: Markets Grind Higher on Presidents' Day Week | Gold Crashes -2.7% | Big Tech Under AI Valuation Pressure | Masimo Explodes +34% | Crypto Flat — BTC $68K, SOL Crushed -49% YoY**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Gold crashes -2.67% ($4,911)** — biggest single-day drop in weeks, silver hammered -5.5%. Risk-on rotation or profit-taking after massive run?
- **Big Tech losing billions on AI fears** — Reuters reports AMZN, GOOG valuations under pressure as market questions AI spend ROI
- **Masimo (MASI) +34%** — top gainer on the day, likely earnings beat or activist catalyst
- **ZIM Shipping +26%** — massive move, container shipping rally continues
- **eToro (ETOR) +18%** — recent IPO/listing momentum continues
- **S&P 500 at 6,857** (+0.31%), Nasdaq 22,633 (+0.38%), Dow 49,651 (+0.30%) — quiet grind higher
- **VIX drops -4.2% to 20.30** — fear fading

---
